name: fsgnj.s    f[11:7],f[19:15],f[24:20]
impl: DWord_t c_op1 = ConvertNaNBoxing(op1); DWord_t c_op2 = ConvertNaNBoxing(op2); return (c_op1 & 0x7FFFFFFFULL) | ( c_op2          & 0x80000000ULL) | 0xffffffff00000000ULL

name: fsgnjn.s   f[11:7],f[19:15],f[24:20]
impl: DWord_t c_op1 = ConvertNaNBoxing(op1); DWord_t c_op2 = ConvertNaNBoxing(op2); return (c_op1 & 0x7FFFFFFFULL) | (~c_op2          & 0x80000000ULL) | 0xffffffff00000000ULL

name: fsgnjx.s   f[11:7],f[19:15],f[24:20]
impl: DWord_t c_op1 = ConvertNaNBoxing(op1); DWord_t c_op2 = ConvertNaNBoxing(op2); return (c_op1 & 0x7FFFFFFFULL) | ((c_op1 ^ c_op2) & 0x80000000ULL) | 0xffffffff00000000ULL
